values:
I basically haven't read anything this year. I don't remember the order

Love Times Three - The Dargers and Brooke Adams And the Mountains Echoed - Khaled Hosseini Becoming Sister Wives - The Browns Seriously...I'm Kidding - Ellen Degeneres Deadlocked - Charlaine Harris Dead Ever After - Charlaine Harris Beautiful Creatures Beautiful Chaos Beautiful Redemption Beautiful Darkness - Kami Garcia

Maybe that's it.

Click Here to Donate Hey everyone! This May I'll be doing the 2009 Arthritis Walk at Phoenix Zoo. I'm starting early on raising money. Please donate anything you can to help sponsor me. I want to make a big difference and help find a cure for Arthritis, cuz let me tell you ITS A BITCH. Anyone who would like to come walk with me PLEASE JOIN TEAM SCORPIONS. Thanks for everything! Sheri Pop My personal Donation Page XOXO

Hmmmm No I did not! haha 6/18- I realize by this week I should be on book 24, not 18 so I need to do some serious catching up, a book a day maybe? We'll see. 10/17- I should be on book 42, not 24 :( 11/30 - I'm still no where near 50 :( But 30 is good too.

p.s. this list is saved as a link on my journal in the sidebar; if anyone wants to view it.

I actually have a hard time picking out what book to read. I usually read a book that everyone raved about about 2 years ago, read it, love it, then read other books from the same author. Or, I'm part of this book clubs that sometimes sends me random books. I also like to read books related to the subject of books I already like. Ex: I read the Da Vinci Code, so I read other books about Mary Magdalene and Christian conspiracy or religious art history in Europe and other places.

I guess there are many ways I pick out a book. I need to begin another book, because I just finished Angels & Demons. I need to read a book I already own though because I'm po'. Maybe I'll continue reading Misquoting Jesus or finish the Snow Fox.

My interpreter test went really well today.
Work didn't suck too much.
